flixel.system.frontEnds.ConsoleFrontEnd

type
class

Constructor

new()
Just needed to create an instance.

Instance Variables

autoPause : Bool

Whether the console should auto-pause or not when it's focused. Only works for flash atm.

Instance Methods

inline addCommand(Command : String, AnyObject : Dynamic, Function : Dynamic, ?Alt : String) : Void

parameters
Command The command's name.
AnyObject Object containing the function (this if function is within the class you're calling this from).
Function Function to be called with params when the command is entered.
Alt Alternative name for the command, useful as a shortcut.
Add a custom command to the console on the debugging screen.

inline registerFunction(FunctionAlias : String, Function : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
FunctionAlias The name with which you want to access the function.
Function The function to register.
Register a new function to use for the call command.

inline registerObject(ObjectAlias : String, AnyObject : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
ObjectAlias The name with which you want to access the object.
AnyObject The object to register.
Register a new object to use for the set command.
